title: new people joining LOL
body: so like i just started and i got the box i thought i'd get like a free champion or something all i got was a ward skin shard and a skin shard? u guys dont start off players with any champions or essence? also i know how the loot crafting thing works for new players it takes like a week to be able to get enough key fragments to open a box.. whats up with that? u guys give almost nothing to new players to start.

replies.body: We do start off new players with the weekly free rotation, and through playing games, you can earn more of those chests to get free content. The weekly free rotation includes 10 champions that cover most of the general playstyles to give you a decent selection.
